attributes.action: Obtain the freedom of information act for Katrice Lee
attributes.additional_details: On 28th November 1981 two-year-old Katrice Lee vanished from a supermarket on a British army base in Germany, she has never been seen since. For over thirty-six years now her family have been trying to find out what happened to Katrice that day, the army have investigated but won’t release any details of the investigation. We know mistakes were made in the investigation but we don’t know what or how.  We the undersigned demand the freedom of information for this investigation so we can find some answers.
